PERSONA:
meet david johnson, a 58-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area in the mountain region of the western united states. david is a well-educated individual, having earned a postgraduate degree from a prestigious university. he takes great pride in his white non-hispanic heritage and was born and raised in the united states.

david is a devout member of the church of jesus christ of latter-day saints (mormon) and attends religious services once a week. his strong faith shapes his conservative values and worldview. despite leaning towards the democratic party, david identifies as an independent voter and considers himself a moderate or conservative democrat.

with a family income exceeding $100,000, david falls into the middle-income tier and enjoys a comfortable lifestyle. he is a registered voter and takes his civic responsibilities seriously. david is an avid internet user, spending a significant amount of time online almost constantly.

in addition to his professional and personal commitments, david finds time for volunteerism, actively contributing to his community. he values education, hard work, and family values, and strives to uphold these principles in his daily life.
